**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 41 **Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13) **Prerequisites** Master in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9); [Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871) --- Pathfinders are trained to help each other be safe and successful, and you know how to jolt your allies back to their senses. Attempt a [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check on an adjacent ally who is [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14), [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36), or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) and choose one of those conditions. The DC is the DC for the effect that caused the condition. **Critical Success** Reduce the value of the chosen condition by 2. If you chose fascinated, that condition ends.
**Success** Reduce the value of the chosen condition by 1. If you chose fascinated, that condition ends.
**Failure** The target is unaffected.
**Critical Failure** You increase the value of the chosen condition by 1. If you chose fascinated, increase the duration by 1 round instead.
name: Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent)
prerequisite: Master in Medicine; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
